## StreamEventCallback type

A function to execute when a [StreamEvent](./chat-core.streamevent.md) occur.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type StreamEventCallback<T extends string = StreamEventName> = (event: Extract<StreamEvent, {
    event: EnumOrLiteral<T>;
}>) => void;
```
